case 2471: if(c.gwdPoints >= 20) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2059, 3150, 0); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(coordhere, coordhere, 0); c.sendMessage("You need 20 kills to use this portal."); }[/quote]

Oh you’re back again! XD haha. Nah it’s fine, fixed it! Didn’t have a break; at the end

item.title: [PI] Portal Glitch!
item.dc:creator: @ProximityPlus ProximityPlus
item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

Hiya guys, I’ve found a problem when using one of my portals. The portal checks if you have 20 killcount and then teleports you somewhere. If they do not have 20 kills then it sends a message. But the problem I am having is that it teleports them to Lumbridge instead of the coords that I have set it to.

Here is the code (ActionHandler.java)

	case 2471:
		if(c.gwdPoints >= 20) {
		c.getPA().movePlayer(2059, 3150, 0);
		} else {
		c.sendMessage("You need 20 kills to use this portal.");
		}

And here is my spawning code in the ObjectManager.java

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2471, 2586, 3916, 0, 10);

Please help guys! Really stuck on this one.

Read full topic
